alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands; Centennial Mountains, Island Park (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 10 at 3:11AM MST until March 11 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow with a mix of rain and snow in the valleys. Additional snow accumulations of 10 to 20 inches in the mountains above 6500 feet MSL and 3 to 9 inches in the valleys below. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Island Park, Kilgore, Dubois, Spencer, Edie School, and Small. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will likely impact the morning and evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by visiting 511.idaho.gov.

area.areaDesc: Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands; Centennial Mountains, Island Park
